gui.saving.image

Class ExImaSingleImagePanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • gui.saving.SingleImagePanel
              • gui.saving.image.ExImaSingleImagePanel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class ExImaSingleImagePanel
extends SingleImagePanel
    The Class ExImaSingleImagePanel. Shows information of single ImageLayer and its MarkingLayers when exporting ImageLayers.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
